full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Title**: W0127-22P038 - Purchase of Jib Crane, Chain Hoist, and Installation Services

**Reference Number**: WS3833447860

**Publication Date**: 2023-03-16
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-13T14:00:00 EDT

**Bid Requirements**
-------------------

The Department of National Defence, 1 Service Battalion (DND), invites bids for the supply, delivery, offloading, and installation of two (2) L Style Jib Cranes and Electric Chain Hoists. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and a bid submission by 2023-04-13T14:00:00 EDT.

**Important Note**: The original closing time for bid submissions was incorrect. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the Buyandsell posting closing time.

**Bid Selection Criteria**: The bid will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

* The region of delivery is Edmonton, Alberta.
* The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
* The end-user entity is the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact Erin Kaiser (SPAC/PSPC) at (erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This bid is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Notice URL**
---------------

You can find the complete bid notice at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15723768?extsite=MTU3MjM3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15723768?extsite=MTU3MjM3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (FR) [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15723768?extsite=MTU3MjM3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15723768?extsite=MTU3MjM3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (EN) 

Hope you like the rewritten announcement.
